tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Defensless
programme.desc: A woman Navy ensign shoots and kills a Turkish colonel; she claims self-defense.

programme.title: JAG: With Intent to Die
programme.desc: With help from Harm, Mac, Harriet, and Bud, Admiral Chedwiggen investigates the apparent suicide of his mentor, Admiral Clancy, who allegedly shot himself while on a hunting trip. Harm and company ultimately uncover who the killer was.

programme.title: JAG: Father's Day
programme.desc: Mac and Harm are assigned the task of defending a young Marine whose frustration at being unable to wrest custody of his son has led to his being court-martialed for dereliction of duty.

programme.title: JAG: Tiger, Tiger
programme.desc: Harm takes Josh on a weekend cruise for Navy families aboard a frigate. When the frigate is taken over by terrorists who intend to fire missiles at Cuba, Harm and Bud take matters into their own hands to stop the evil plot.

programme.title: JAG: Return of Mimmy Blackhorse
programme.desc: An Army forensic pathologist joins forces with Harm, Mac, Bud and Harriet as they try to verify that newly unearthed human remains are those of a heroic Navajo "code-talker" who had been missing since WWII.

programme.title: JAG: The Imposter
programme.desc: Harm is held captive by Palmer, a renegade government agent with whom he had crossed swords a few months ago. While Palmer prepares a life mask so he can pass for Harm, he explains his plans to assassinate the key witness in the trial.

programme.title: JAG: To Russia With Love
programme.desc: With evidence that his missing father could still be alive in, Harm convinces the Admiral to give him time off so he can go to Russia. In Moscow, they are questioned by Mark Falcon, the KGB agent who had stolen a list of POW's earlier from Harm.

programme.title: JAG: Gypsy Eyes
programme.desc: Unable to lose the pursuing Russian fighters, Harm's and Mac’s hijacked Mig is shot out of the sky over Siberia.

programme.title: JAG: Act of Terror
programme.desc: When Arab terrorists attach a mine to a US Navy warship in an attempt to sink it, Marine guards are able to kill one and capture the other, even after the mine explodes, killing two sailors.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Maroon 8
programme.desc: While en route to Toby and Happy's honeymoon, Team Scorpion's plane crash lands on a remote deserted island, leaving them all with little hope for rescue.

programme.title: Scorpion: Scorp Family Robinson
programme.desc: Three weeks after they crash land on a deserted island, tensions run high for Team Scorpion when they must battle to overcome their relationship obstacles with each other in order to be rescued.

programme.title: Scorpion: Extinction
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must work with their old nemesis Mark Collins in order to prevent the extinction of mankind. Also, Walter and Paige awkwardly navigate their new relationship. Josh Leonard guest stars.

programme.title: Scorpion: More Extinction
programme.desc: Team Scorpion continues to work with their nemesis, Mark Collins, in order to prevent an extinction event that could end humanity. Also, Cabe's last-minute decision while on the case leads to the possible end of his career.

programme.title: Scorpion: Grow a Deer, A Female Deer
programme.sub-title: Grow a Deer, A Female Deer
programme.desc: When poachers almost kill a pregnant endangered deer, Team Scorpion recreates the animal's womb to try to save it and its baby's life. Also, Happy and Toby discuss the future of their family.

programme.title: Scorpion: Nuke Kids on the Block
programme.desc: While decommissioning an old nuclear missile, a simple accident causes Team Scorpion to endure exposure to toxic vapor while trying to prevent the nuke from detonating.

programme.title: Scorpion: Sci Hard
programme.desc: While attending a tech convention, Team Scorpion is taken hostage by a group attempting a virtual heist.

programme.title: Scorpion: Queen Scary
programme.desc: At Halloween, Team Scorpion takes on a case to prove the existence of ghosts on the Queen Mary but find an all-too-real disaster when they locate a 'ghost ship' on a deadly collision course.

programme.title: Scorpion: Go With the Florence
programme.desc: While tracking a device that can prevent a nuclear meltdown through the Los Angeles sewers, Walter learns the nuances of listening and not offering advice to Paige.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: To Serve or Protect
programme.desc: What was to be a routine day for Andy is abruptly put on holdwhen herex-copper father, Tommy, confesses that he might have committed a serious crime during one of his alcohol-induced blackouts.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Judgment Day
programme.desc: There’s a nervous tension in the air on Judgment Day for all therookies at 15 Division who will have to undergo make-or-break assessments by Staff Sergeant Frank.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Takedown
programme.desc: Andy and Chris accidentally screw up one of the biggest drug busts of the decade when they arrest one of the players. In an effort to save the operation, Swarek and Andy go undercover to make the drug buy.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Butterflies
programme.desc: Andy's world explodes when a fresh-faced university student is killed in a random shooting, and a bullet hits Andy, lodging in her vest.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Might Have Been
programme.desc: Everyone's living their “might-have-beens.” Andy and Gail go undercover as cocktail waitresses to clean up a drug-infested club, but get more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Bad Moon
programme.desc: As a full moon hangs over the city, the rookies are unnerved by a series of strange occurrences. While investigating the theft of three severed heads, Andy and Swarek pick up the trail of a mentally unstable man who has stopped taking his medication.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Heart & Sparks
programme.desc: As 15 Division recovers from the shooting of Det. Luke Callaghan, a series of arsons culminates in the torching of a laundromat – and the rookies are forced to confront their own burning issues.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Stung
programme.desc: Using a local car dealership, 15 Division runs a sting operation to crack down on suspects with outstanding warrants. One of the criminals they capture tries to bargain for a lighter sentence.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: In Plain View
programme.desc: When a police informant is found murdered, 15 Division sets its sights on finding a weak link in the notoriously brutal East Jameson gang. Andy has to work closely with Detective Jo Rosati, a woman who seems far too interested in Andy’s fiancé, Luke.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Croxteth Hall Part 1
programme.desc: The team take on one of the grandest properties in Great Britain, Liverpool’s Croxteth Hall\nin a non-stop two-hour heart pounding investigation.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Croxteth Hall Part 2
programme.desc: We stay with the team and find out what happened after we left them last time. The team\nseem to be stalked by something…but what.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Haden Hill House Part 1
programme.desc: An old house in England’s West Midlands gives the Most Haunted team a night they will\nnever forget.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Haden Hill House Part 2
programme.desc: The strange occurrences at Hayden Hill House switch up a gear as whatever is there seems\nnow to be stalking the team with some terrifying results, at least for some of the crew it is\nproving too much.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Keithley Bus Museum
programme.desc: Once an old foundry, this large old building houses vehicles from a bygone era that are said\nto still contain passengers whose destination has never ended.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Rowleys House
programme.desc: The team head to the centre of Shrewsbury and a large building that is all but empty.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Fleece Inn
programme.desc: This old pup in the heart of West Yorkshire is said to be one of the Most Haunted places in\nEngland.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Judges Lodgings Part 1
programme.desc: Yvette heads to Presteigne, Mid Wales and the famous Judges Lodgings, were courts were\nheld, people imprisoned and Judges stayed, but it also holds many a secret.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Judges Lodgings Part 2
programme.desc: Most Haunted continues its investigation into the Judges Lodgings where the team seem to\nbe under attack and something is trying to get through a door…but what?(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 3
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 7
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Roller Ghoster
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,TAPS heads to Ohio to investigate Kings Island, anamusement park that sits on land that was thesite of an awful accident.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Shock Island / Asylum & Testing Lab / The Surf Hotel
programme.sub-title: Shock Island / Asylum & Testing Lab / The Surf Hotel
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Scott Township, Pennsylvania to investigate the Pennsylvania Asylum and Testing Lab.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Mark Twain House
programme.desc: TAPS is called to the former home of one of the world's most famous authors in order to investigate a series of startling paranormal occurrences.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Civil War Spirits
programme.desc: The site of the bloodiest battle of the Revolutionary War sets the stage for an unforgettable investigation by TAPS.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Pearl Harbor Phantoms
programme.desc: For the first time ever, TAPS travels to Hawaii to explore one of America's most sacred settings, Pearl Harbor. They are joined in their investigation of the Pacific Aviation Museum by Destination Truth's Josh Gates.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Coroner's Case
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is called to Shreveport, Louisiana where the employees and owner of the Rendall Building are experiencing terrifying paranormal activity.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Lost in a Space That Isn't There
programme.sub-title: Lost in a Space That Isn't There
programme.desc: The Abyss has infected Beka. The crew must find a way to save her.

programme.title: Andromeda: Abridging the Devil's Divide
programme.desc: After some of the crew is captured, Harper is forced to work on a time bridge for the Patriarch.

programme.title: Andromeda: Trusting the Gordian Maze
programme.desc: A spy from Tri Gemma shows up on the Andromeda in an attempt to steal the star map.

programme.title: Andromeda: A Symmetry of Imperfection
programme.desc: When Rommie becomes too emotional, the ship cuts her access in order to run diagnostics.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: After being left stranded near a black hole, Captain Dylan Hunt is discovered by a mercenary salvage ship and finds he has been frozen in time for 300 years.

programme.title: Andromeda: An Affirming Flame
programme.desc: Dylan protects the Andromeda from mercenaries while Beka starts to wonder if they are fighting for the wrong side.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan finds a space station full of kids who believe he is there to bring peace by killing their enemies.

programme.title: Andromeda: D Minus Zero
programme.desc: The Andromeda crew is still learning how to work together as they are attacked by the Restorers.

programme.title: Andromeda: Double Helix
programme.desc: The Andromeda gets involved in a feud between a Than planet and a Nietzschean colony.

programme.title: Andromeda: Angel Dark, Demon Bright
programme.desc: A slipstream sends the Andromeda back in time to just before the Commonwealth fell. The crew must intervene to preserve history.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.208
programme.desc: Ex-lovers dispute ownership of a snow blower, weight bench, and alleged loan. License plate found in damaged car from a crash, but alleged party denies responsibility.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.154
programme.desc: A man says he was thrown on top of a car by a club bouncer after being wrongfully accused of hitting someone in the bathroom.\t\t\t\r\nA woman sues her twin brother for allegedly drinking, driving her car without permission, and wrecking it.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.159
programme.desc: Woman regrets co-signing loan with boyfriend. 11-year-old on dirt bike crashes into moving car; driver claims bike appeared suddenly.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.139
programme.desc: Ex accuses ex-boyfriend of car theft; new boyfriend helps buy new car. Roommates feud over tattoos, skydiving, and family illness expenses.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.27
programme.desc: A young woman discovers her boyfriend at his ex-lover’s house and\t\t\t\r\nallegedly takes out her anger on his car/A 10-year-old is accused of running across and damaging the freshly-cemented sidewalk on his neighbor’s driveway.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.31
programme.desc: The emotional burial of a pet Chihuahua leads to a violent, bloody\t\t\t\r\nassault between family members/A woman sues her ex-fiancé for a loan to buy a home. He claims she wrecked his truck while driving drunk, so he’s not paying.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.67
programme.desc: Teenager sued by cousin for drunk driving; blames cousin for letting minors drink. Woman claims sprayed with hose due to dog suspected of relieving on neighbor's lawn.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.193
programme.desc: Custody battle and bounced check drama escalate with Wal Mart "Amber Alert." Mother-daughter lawsuit ensues from car wreck involving hitchhikers.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.120
programme.desc: A woman and her teen daughter accuse an estranged relative of assaulting them at a family party/A woman is suing her former friend for repossessing her truck; her friend argues that the vehicle was never insured.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.189
programme.desc: A handgun comes between a brother and sister who sue over the alleged destruction of property during a heated fight.\t\t\t\r\nAccusing his mother of losing his rightful inheritance, a man denies owing her for unpaid loans and car insurance payments.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.226
programme.desc: A father intervenes, hiring attorneys to aid his son in jail release and custody battles after domestic violence charges. The son denies owing anything. A teenager sues ex-roommates for lease breakage.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.125
programme.desc: Family disputes details and payment for deceased woman's $19,000 funeral after 15-year cancer battle/Ex-boyfriend sued for unpaid credit card charges in her name; cites father's death and hardships.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.76
programme.desc: Breast feeding a child while taking Vicodin is the accusation laid\t\t\t\r\nagainst a woman whose husband is being sued by a former friend\t\t\t\r\nfor an unpaid loan/A man accidentally kicks a female co-worker in the head while goofing around in the office.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.25
programme.desc: Paint-gun player sued for shooting alleged drug addict in head; claims $10 deal/Woman sues ex-friend for car damage during move; he asserts abandonment with video evidence.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.253
programme.desc: A man is suing his ex-girlfriend’s son for allegedly stealing his dog and for purposely ramming his car with his bicycle.\t\t\t\r\nA loan to pay life insurance, the return of property, and alleged harassment are disputed by ex-lovers.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.248
programme.desc: A woman and her mother sue their former friend for furniture return; he claims they owe him a loan. Another woman sues her son's ex-friend's mother for car impound costs.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.26
programme.desc: Intoxicated bride sues friend for face punch at wedding, accused teen claims self-defense/Woman accuses ex of cheating, he defends as moving on; dispute over living room set balance.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.94
programme.desc: A single mother dips into her savings to bail an ex-boyfriend out of jail after he was arrested for not paying child support.A woman sues her granddaughter for money she allegedly borrowed to pay for her prom.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.260
programme.desc: A young woman sues for damages after a catfight at a party. Another woman claims chest contusions from breaking up the fight and sues the man she alleges beat her up.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After Ashley goes home, the chefs compete in a Letter Lottery challenge. The women enjoy a beautiful day in Santa Barbara. At dinner service, Josh has a portion control problem, Giovanni sends up raw pork, and Benjamin serves a raw Wellington.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: There is an immediate fallout after Josh and Robyn switch teams. Robyn is embraced, but Josh clashes with Elise. The next day, the chefs compete in an outdoor plank cooking challenge. Josh nearly smothers his team's fire and the red team loses.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: 13 all-star chefs go head-to-head to create pizzas inspired by countries from all over the world to test their knowledge of diverse ingredients and ethnic flavours. A tie between the red and blue teams is broken.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Both teams replicate six Hell's Kitchen entrees while kicking chefs out of the kitchen until only one remains. Chef Ramsay holds a `Cook For Your Life' challenge. Robyn, Giovanni, Milly, Barbie, Manda, and Elise must recreate his signature dish.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After Giovanni goes home, Michelle and Elise continue their heated fight. The chefs compete in a game meat challenge. Michelle sends up raw chicken, Barbie sends up raw duck and Manda sends up raw pork. The teams must decide who to nominate.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Elise and Michelle get into a heated argument that carries over into the next day. In the challenge, the chefs toss fish to collect ingredients. While Barbie annoys her team in punishment, the blue team heads to Vegas for a night of revelry.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Nine all-star chefs compete in a blind taste test challenge, in which they must identify herbs and spices with smashing consequences for their teammates. While one chef guesses, one chef sits in the hot seat and is hit with a mashed potato cannon.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With eight chefs remaining, the red and blue teams battle in a pasta-profit challenge and later go toe-to-toe in a dinner service that features a tense race to the finish.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After Dana goes home, the seven remaining chefs learn that it is black jacket day. Chef Ramsay explains that the chefs will compete in three challenges in order to earn their black jacket.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canada’s largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Bernt Bodal is the CEO of American Seafoods, one of the largest seafood companies in the United States. He is going undercover to look for ways for the company to grow.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the world’s largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dirty Talk
programme.desc: Russell tries to get out of his marriage to an overly enthused Liz, who tries to make it work, while Jeff attempts to engage Audrey in dirty talk.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bros Before Nodes
programme.desc: Worried about getting his father's approval, Russell gets Liz all dolled up to meet him.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey Is Dumb
programme.desc: Jeff celebrates Audrey's inability to talk after her node removal surgery. Russell gets Timmy to fire an employee for him, and Adam discovers he's only getting free stuff because of his good looks.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Nature Calls
programme.desc: Everyone spends a weekend in Vermont to watch the leaves change. During the trip, Adam gets poison ivy on his hands, Jeff has an embarrassing experience on the inn's computer, and Liz begins to realize that her marriage is a sham.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Shy Dial
programme.desc: Jeff uses an app on his phone that automatically puts his calls through to Audrey's voicemail. Meanwhile, Adam befriends a clothing salesman who helps him against his friends when he picks up some questionable clothing choices.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cheating
programme.desc: Audrey tries to persuade Jeff to eat healthier when he is diagnosed with high cholesterol, but he can’t help sneaking around with Brenda for unhealthy food.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Chair
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey engage in a battle of wills when she refuses to admit that she hates the armchair she ordered while Jeff pretends to love it.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy's help in finding it.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Big Bust
programme.desc: Audrey believes her maid needs an operation to correct the limp she has to be able to walk better, thinking she is doing the right thing Audrey asks her neighbors to contribute to the cause not having any idea what the money is really intended for.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: After The Lovin'
programme.desc: Frustrated by his boss blaming him for burning his mouth on hot soup, Timmy has a special spoon created for Russell. Audrey's plan backfires when she tries to seduce Jeff in the bedroom in order to get him to complete household tasks.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Missed Connections
programme.desc: Timmy wants to reconnect with a woman he met on the subway; Jeff and Audrey turn on each other when former friends snub them.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Five Things
programme.desc: Jeff can't think of five nice things to say about Audrey; Russell encourages Timmy to serenade a woman; Jennifer and Adam mistakenly get Jeff and Audrey's bank statement.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Meat Wars
programme.desc: Audrey drags Jen to a Bon Jovi concert to prove that she's still young and fun, leaving Jeff and Adam at home. Russell finds a phone number in his pocket and asks Timmy to investigate.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Goodbye Dolly
programme.desc: Audrey tries to prepare for motherhood by continuing to repair a doll that she keeps damaging. Meanwhile, Jeff questions whether the very pregnant Brenda should be dating anymore, and Adam tries to convince Jennifer that he is a manly man.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Shower
programme.desc: Jen puts the wrong date on the invitations to Audrey's baby shower, Jeff likes Audrey's maternity clothes, and Russell gives up women.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Liz Moves In
programme.desc: Liz temporarily moves in with Jeff and Audrey. Jeff isn't happy with the new guest, but changes his mind when he discovers Liz consistently takes his side against Audrey.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Taking Names
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey realize that the names on their baby list are also the names of women that Russell has slept with. Adam becomes a cycling enthusiast after Jennifer suggests they start riding bikes in the park.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Feeling lonely after her cat dies, Liz looks for a sperm donor. When Timmy's intellect and innocence don't attract his crush, he tries his hand at playing 'big dog.' Adam rips the vintage wedding dress that Jennifer's family sent her.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Dog and his old friends, Tim Chapman and Sonny Westbrook are riding with the team, so their target, a thief with violent tendencies, is out of luck. When Dog learns that the fugitive is also a disrespectful son, he is more motivated to find his man.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Ties
programme.desc: Dog doesn't have the whole team today and he's got to catch a fugitive with a record of criminal assault. But when Dog finds the fugitive's former girlfriend, she thinks he isn't dangerous at all.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Special Delivery
programme.desc: For months, this fugitive has been stringing Leland along with a series of barely believable excuses. Out of patience, Leland calls in the Big Dog. The whole team heads out to put pressure on the family and friends of the fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surface Scratches
programme.desc: Dog's latest quarry is running from abuse and assault charges. As Dog investigates, he discovers that this fugitive has gamed the system by jumping from one bond, and one bondsman, to another.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Great Debate
programme.desc: When the co-signer of a bond is also romantically involved with the defendant, sometimes the bondman is put in the middle of a lover's quarrel.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Facebooked
programme.desc: Dog is in Denver helping Bobby Brown to track down a fugitive with a long rap sheet. But unfortunately they have no picture of the felon to work with, so the challenges are big on this one. But Dog discovers a new source; "Facebook".

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mano-a-Mano
programme.desc: Back in Colorado, Dog's on the hunt for a runner with more than a decade's worth of trouble with the law. But the fugitive's friends and family are reluctant to help Dog bring him in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.sub-title: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.desc: After releasing the second part of his autobiography, Dog and his family traveled across America, and this very special episode offers an intimate portrait of both the public and private moments of that journey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Comeback Kid
programme.desc: Dog is back in Colorado chasing a young man with a taste for trouble. He's fled to Texas but with his family's house on the line Dog is willing to try a risky strategy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tent City
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Dead of Night
programme.desc: Dog's good friend and fellow bondsman Chris is running out of time. He has only days to find his fugitive or risk losing his business. In his hunt Dog confronts duplicitous tipsters, vicious attack dogs, and hostile neighbors.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Brand of Brothers
programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image, so he and the guys create their own new logo and business cards. Meanwhile, Willie and Phil help Bella with her science project.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: De-Bug Life
programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home. Meanwhile, while the kids are running the church car wash, Si and Willie disagree on the best way to draw in customers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Men vs. Wild
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Si is interested in finding a new hobby when he sees Kay cutting coupons.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Return of the Beavers
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Stumped on a way to celebrate Willie's birthday, Korie enlists the guys' help and Jase takes the reigns in planning a trip to the lake where Phil and Kay used to live. Meanwhile, the women realize a raccoon is inside the lake house.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.sub-title: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots. Willie organizes a bus tour to trace his family heritage.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack in the Saddle
programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race. Meanwhile, when Kay decides she wants to buy a new birdbath for her yard, she recruits Phil, Martin and Godwin.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.(n)

programme.title: Encounter
programme.desc: A group of friends uncover an otherworldly object in a rural field, which they soon discover holds greater secrets than they could imagine.

programme.title: Magical Adventures in the Forbidden City
programme.desc: In another world Abigail lives in a city whose borders were closed years ago because of a disease. She takes us on a magical adventure, rising against the forces in command and shows how being brave and following your heart can show anything is possible.

programme.title: Area Q
programme.desc: After his son disappears a journalist goes to Brazil to investigate, where he discovers close encounter sightings that have taken place in a region known as Area Q, where he may uncover the mystery surrounding his son's disappearance.

programme.title: Solar Attack
programme.desc: When the sun's increasing expulsions of plasma threaten to ignite methane in our atmosphere, international tensions rise while scientists race for a solution to avoid natural disaster.

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: In 2050, 86-year-old Marjorie has a holographic companion who resembles her dead husband and is programmed to feed her the story of her life. With Lois Smith, Jon Hamm, Geena Davis.(n)

programme.title: Bandidas
programme.desc: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.

programme.title: Antboy
programme.desc: 12-year-old Pelle is bitten by an ant and develops superpowers. Aided by comic book nerd Wilhelm, Pelle creates a secret identity as superhero Antboy.

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a call-girl-turned-actress and works to help her advance her career, but things get a little more complicated than they bargained for.

programme.title: One Last Dance
programme.desc: In the wake of tragedy, a renowned NY dance company is on the brink of collapse. After leaving the dance world for good, Travis, Chrissa and Max have one last chance to re-connect with the passion and prove that miracles really can happen.

programme.title: How To Be A Latin Lover
programme.desc: Eugenio Derbez (INSTRUCTIONS NOT INCLUDED) and Salma Hayek head an all-star cast in this hilarious comedy about an aging ladies’ man who learns that love and trust must be earned.

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Quest For Akhenatens Tomb
programme.sub-title: And The Quest For Akhenatens Tomb
programme.desc: Jack Hunter is abducted blindfolded to a Turkish US base to be recruited by the NSA, told his mentor was killed because Albert Littmann's Russian mob employer Doridanov want the ancient Osiris-weapon.

programme.title: The Big Fight
programme.desc: Tien Peng and Cheung Ching-ching play the leaders of a rebel group of Chinese kung fu fighters in a Japanese occupied town at the height of the war.

programme.title: Descent
programme.desc: A team of scientists are gathered to prevent a global catastrophe. But one of the scientists realizes early on that the cause of volcanic reactions is most likely due to a secret government operation investigating alternative energy resources.

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Lost Treasure of Ugarit
programme.sub-title: And The Lost Treasure of Ugarit
programme.desc: Young archaeologist Jack Hunter refuses to join his mentor, Professor Shaffer, who believes a poem is a coded treasure map, on a relic hunt, until his friend is murdered to steal it. The suspect is a Syrian artifact trader so he flies to Damascas.

programme.title: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
programme.desc: When video-game enthusiast, Sarah is transported into her favorite game, she finds herself on an intergalactic prison, home to the most dangerous villains in the galaxy.

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: In a quest to find a lost colleague, a team of scientists find themselves deep underground in an ancient labyrinth, while trying to unearth a secret that has been buried for centuries.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Lodge
programme.desc: During a weekend trip to the mountains, Mary finds herself at the now run-down lodge where she spent the holidays with her family growing up. She becomes determined to restore the building to its former glory.

programme.title: A Gift Wrapped Christmas
programme.desc: Starring Meredith Hagner, Travis Milne, and Beverley Mitchell. Personal shopper Gwen's new client is a workaholic single father. When Gwen meets his 7-year-old son, she makes their lacking father-son relationship her Christmas mission.

programme.title: I'll Be Next Door For Christmas
programme.desc: When 16-year-old Nicky’s long-distance boyfriend decides to visit for the holidays, she’s determined to spare him her family’s over-the-top Christmas obsession, by staging a fake Christmas dinner in the empty house next door...

programme.title: A Christmoose Story
programme.desc: A large moose crashes through the roof of young Max's garage! A moose who talks! A moose who claims to work for Santa!

programme.title: Holiday in Your Heart
programme.desc: Fourteen-year-old LeAnn Rimes wants nothing more than to sing at the Grand Ole Opry. She is invited to sing at a Christmas concert on Nashville's famous stage, but upon her arrival, she is faced with a difficult decision.(n)

programme.title: Dark Minds
programme.desc: A twisted psychological thriller about a man haunted by his past.

programme.title: The Bachelor Next Door
programme.desc: A newly engaged couple becomes intrigued by the young stranger who moves in next door. He's handsome, friendly and very helpful, but he's no stranger.

programme.title: Watching Over You
programme.desc: Single mom Sarah moves into the suburbs and starts dating a firefighter, only to find herself the target of an obsessive neighborhood watchman who aims to prove he’s the best man to protect her… even if he has to create the danger himself.

programme.title: Deadly Patient
programme.desc: When Dr. Hillary Spenser saves the life of Gregory Lipton, he becomes dangerously obsessed with her, threatening the good doctor and all those in her life.

programme.title: Love You To Death
programme.desc: Talented attorney Yasmine Winter freezes in court, and her mistake allows a murderer go free. Her boss orders her to take a sabbatical but secretly, Yasmine plans to use the time away to rebuild the case she just lost.

programme.title: Statute Of Limitations
programme.desc: High school sweethearts break into a home which ends badly. One takes the rap and goes to prison. Twenty-two years later he's out and looking to resume their relationship. Just how far will he go to reunite with his high school love?(n)

programme.title: Megan Leavey
programme.desc: Young Marine Cpl. Megan Leavey starts to identify with Rex, a particularly aggressive combat dog that she trains. Together, they complete more than 100 missions until an improvised explosive device injures both, putting their fates in jeopardy.

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: Renowned editor Maxwell Perkins (Colin Firth) develops a friendship with author Thomas Wolfe (Jude Law) while working on the writer's manuscripts.

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Washington, D.C., journalist Stephen Glass (Hayden Christensen) swiftly falls from grace when the news breaks that many of his stories were fabricated.

programme.title: Megan Leavey
programme.desc: Young Marine Cpl. Megan Leavey starts to identify with Rex, a particularly aggressive combat dog that she trains. Together, they complete more than 100 missions until an improvised explosive device injures both, putting their fates in jeopardy.

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: Renowned editor Maxwell Perkins (Colin Firth) develops a friendship with author Thomas Wolfe (Jude Law) while working on the writer's manuscripts.

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Eruption at Volcano
programme.desc: Civil War loyalties are split when a group of Southern sympathizers wants to send gold to the Confederacy.

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Price of a Passport
programme.desc: Trappers look for an escape when they're imprisoned by the Mexican governor of San Diego.

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Pioneer Circus
programme.desc: A horsewoman puts a dent in a circus owner's plans to hire another equestrienne.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Marshall Torrance get into trouble with the Army when they try to help a wounded young soldier who deserted.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After Mark contracts typhoid fever and has a vision of his dead mother he no longer seems interested in getting well.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An old friend of Lucas's returns to town in the company of a shady gambler and is accused of cheating at cards.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Several men are vying for a prosperous rancher's daughter's affections. When she is found dead, one of them becomes the prime suspect in her murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas receives a series of mysterious threatening notes from an ex-convict with a grudge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: To keep his invalid mother happy, an outlaw forces Lucas and Mark to go along with a masquerade that he is the owner of Lucas's ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas helps his former Army captain, now an undercover federal agent, infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An ex-convict is blamed for a brutal crime despite his claims of rehabilitation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is out for vengeance when Mark is used as a pawn in a bank robbery scheme.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas shoots a horse thief who turns out to be a member of the Boyle clan. Now Ma Boyle is after him.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Seven condemned murderers escape and take over the town of North Fork.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark finds gold on their property, a fast-talking salesman who tried to sell Lucas a new lightning rod offers instead to buy the ranch's mineral rights.(n)

programme.title: Witches of Oz: Episode 2
programme.desc: Dorothy Gale writes children's books based on the Land of Oz created by her grandfather. Her life turns upside down when she learns that Oz is real and she must stop the Wicked Witch.

programme.title: Heaven Sent
programme.desc: Maire prays that her husband find the strength to let go of their 9 year marriage. Billy is asking that his wife receive the strength and wisdom to hold on. A 8-year-old runaway from heaven takes it upon herself to rekindle the romance that slipped away.

programme.title: The Amazing Burping Pig
programme.desc: When the Rose family move to California it's particularly hard on 7-year-old Talia, who finds it hard to make new friends. One day she finds a teacup pig with a serious burping problem but fearing her parents won't approve, she keeps him hidden.

programme.title: Cybermutt
programme.desc: The powerful dog Rex is injured by a car while rescuing a young scientist from being run over. Feeling responsible for the condition of Rex the scientist uses his skill as a prosthetics inventor to give the dog a new, super-power body.

programme.title: Magic Beyond Words
programme.desc: An inspiring look at JK Rowling's rise to become one of the most influential writers-from her humble beginnings, as an imaginative young girl and awkward teenager, to the loss of her mother and the genesis of the Harry Potter phenomenon.

programme.title: Royal Runaways
programme.desc: A prince doesn't want to become King after his father dies, so he hides at a winery as a handyman to follow his own path.

programme.title: You Stupid Man
programme.desc: A writer struggles to deal with the break-up with his girlfriend. It does not help with getting her out of his mind that she recently became a famous TV start.

programme.title: Peeples
programme.desc: Sparks - and laughs - fly when Wade Walker (Craig Robinson) crashes the Peeples' annual family reunion in the Hamptons to ask for their daughter's (Kerry Washington) hand in marriage.

programme.title: Bottle Shock
programme.desc: The story of the early days of California wine making featuring the now infamous, blind Paris wine tasting of 1976 that has come to be known as "Judgment of Paris". Feat: Chris Pine, Alan Rickman & Bill Pullman.

programme.title: Here Come the Huggetts
programme.desc: A scatterbrained girl disrupts the daily lives of her aunt and uncle when she arrives for a visit.

programme.title: Vote for Huggett
programme.desc: A comical race ensues when a suburbanite and an alderman oppose each other's ambitions and go to war over a parcel of local land.

programme.title: The Hornet's Nest
programme.desc: A jewel thief hides his latest goods in a deserted barge, but ends up in jail. Two young models then buy the barge, and with the help of two little old ladies, find them and claim the reward.

programme.title: House of Secrets
programme.desc: The Paris Police recruit the officer of an English ship to help trap counterfeiters by joining them.

programme.title: Hunted
programme.desc: An unusual relationship develops between a fugitive killer and a runaway orphan on an odyssey across England.

programme.title: The Intruder
programme.desc: Now a successful businessman, a former military colonel is surprised in his home by a burglar whom he recognises. The colonel decides to find out why his old acquaintance was forced to turn to crime.

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Chasing Janus (REDUX)
programme.desc: During a 'sting' operation, Callie is critically wounded. The crew of the Tulip race against the clock to track down her powerful family, who may have the means to save her.

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Spaceman (REDUX)
programme.desc: While exploring a debris field, the Trans-Utopian discovers a sarcophagus floating in space. Mishkin, the lone occupant, spreads an experimental mind-warping disease among the crew that empowers their alter-egos and cause dangerous conflicts.

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Becoming Shiva (REDUX)
programme.desc: A Terran terrorist group protesting the ecological disasters that have plagued them detonate a bomb on the city state space station, Ring Sheppard. The crew are hired to track them down and break the ring up. More easily said than done.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Smoking Gun
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel search for Al Capone's diamond-encrusted gun at the behest of a man hoping it will clear his grandfather of a murder he was framed for.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Affaire de Coeur
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel go to Scotland to find the second ring of the pair of Twining Rings of Calum and Elena.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Thank You Very Much
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel go to Germany to find a lost Elvis Presley guitar.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Transformation
programme.desc: Sydney, Nigel and Derek Lloyd go to the Peruvian jungle to look for the Paracelsus scrolls which contain the formula for turning lead into gold.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Flag Day
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel head to Larivee, California to find the Pioneer's Bear Flag.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Emperor's Bride
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel are in Moose Bay, Alaska looking for the white jade sarcophagus of a Chinese Empress. Sydney runs into fellow relic hunters Dallas Carter and Kurt Reiner.

programme.title: The Lost World: Birthright
programme.desc: Summerlee, Roxton, and Veronica must outrun a T-rex that's tracking them for dinner. Meanwhile Marguerite, Malone, and Challenger are manipulated by Ramses to help him take his place as pharaoh.

programme.title: The Lost World: Resurrection
programme.desc: Malone and Veronica must defend the treehouse from mercenaries. After being ambushed by Norse warriors, Roxton must take the life of another in order to rise from the dead and save Marguerite.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Emma reunites with an old friend who possesses telecyber powers. The reunion turns dangerous, however, when Michelle tries to turn Emma over to the GSA.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Adam is framed for murder by a New Mutant with the ability to steal people's memories.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: A mutant with telepathic abilities who can make people experience, mentally, anything he wants manages to get into the minds of Mutant X. Now he is making them experience their worst fears.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: When Mutant X and Genomex are captured on film using their powers, they both have to deal with the reporter who plans to go public with the information.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Shalimar's former boyfriend shows up and is trying to recover a Fabergé Egg that holds a microchip of extraordinary power.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team tries to stop Eckhart from acquiring a rare element, but a thief gets it. The woman who has the ability to make men fall in love with her sets her sights on Brennan.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Summit
programme.desc: Da'an leaves and doesn't being Liam along. Zo'or is frantic as to why Da'an left. Liam wants to help but Zo'or doesn't trust him because he doesn't have a CVI, so Liam agrees to be implanted.
